programme.title: It's Sew Easy: How to Serge a Blind Hem and a Flat Lock Stitch
programme.desc: Angela Wolf shows how to serge a blind hem and a flat lock stitch.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Self Fabric Belt - Cutting Buttonholes - Perfect Hems - Flat Felted Seams
programme.desc: Learn how to make fabric belts, perfect hems, and flat felted seams! And a bonus - your guide into cutting buttonholes.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Topstitching and Changing Pocket Angles
programme.desc: Update your wardrobe! Learn how to topstitch and change pocket angles.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Spaghetti Straps - Fringe on Felted Wool - Embroidery on Faux Leather
programme.desc: Learn how to make spaghetti straps, fringe on felted wool and create beautifully cool embroidery on faux leather!

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Adding Pockets to a Jacket Sleeve
programme.desc: Angela Wolf adds pockets to the sleeve of a jacket.

programme.title: It's Sew Easy: Refashion Pants for Zip Off Shorts
programme.desc: Angela Wolf refashions pants to zip off shorts.

programme.title: Fabric to Fashion
programme.desc: Fabric to Fashion is a reality show featuring designers and sewist from all over the world. Designers are given a challenge, then we follow the guests designing in their own sewing spaces. Angela Wolf mentors and guides the designers throughout each challenge, and often throws in a few extra twists!

programme.title: Fabric to Fashion

programme.title: The Stitchery: I Made a Water Fountain Dog Bowl for My Puppy!

programme.title: Amargosa
programme.desc: In the remote California ghost town of Death Valley Junction (pop 10) stands the Amargosa Opera House, where for the past 33 years former New York dancer and artist Marta Becket has performed her own ballets in the theater she spent seven years hand painting with stunning murals. For Becket, the creative life is an obstacle course of self-doubt, criticism and abandonment, - a high price to pay in the pursuit of self-expression.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: But I Don’t Have A Domino – Loose Mortise and Tenon Joints
programme.desc: How to make loose mortise and tenon joints with a router.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Lumber Purchasing and Terminology aka A Lumbering Feeling
programme.desc: Learn with Marc how to select and buy the best lumber for your projects.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Milling Lumber aka The Jointer's Jumpin'
programme.desc: Learn how to properly mill your lumber with Marc in this episode because you not gonna get far without it!

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Butcher Block End Grain Cutting Board aka A Cut Above
programme.desc: Make an awesome grain cutting board with Marc in this episode!

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Natural Wood Color Changes aka A Colorful Conversation
programme.desc: Learn with Marc about the science of natural wood color changes.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Off to the Woodworking Show Part 2
programme.desc: In this special, Marc interviews Steve Harris, the President of Fine Woodworkers Association in Arizona.

programme.desc: A beginner's cutting board course from the woodworker's point of view.

programme.title: The Wood Whisperer: Mortise and Tenon Options aka Tenons Anyone?
programme.desc: Learn with Marc about the most important and the strongest joints in woodworking - Mortise and Tenon joints.

programme.desc: Marc teaches how to sketch up design for a new exciting project - arts & crafts table.

programme.desc: Marc teaches how to finish up your arts & crafts table so it will serve you for a long long time.
